availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Bullitt County, Kentucky, farm laborer and soldier. Bullitt County native. Son of William Thompson and Sarah Thompson. Second lieutenant and first lieutenant in the 15th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) from December 14, 1861 to October 26, 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bullitt County, p. 210A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bullitt County, District 1, p. 14.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bullitt County, p. 277.
Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers who Served in Organizations From State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Roll 287.
